verses.text: \w The|strong="H2372"\w* \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* \w which|strong="H5030"\w* \w Habakkuk|strong="H2265"\w* \w the|strong="H2372"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w did|strong="H5030"\w* \w see|strong="H2372"\w*.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* dost \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* \w show|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5999"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w* \w upon|strong="H7200"\w* \w perverseness|strong="H5999"\w*? \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7701"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*; \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w strife|strong="H7379"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w contention|strong="H4066"\w* riseth \w up|strong="H5375"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w slacked|strong="H6313"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w doth|strong="H6662"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w doth|strong="H6662"\w* \w compass|strong="H3803"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*; \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w goeth|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w perverted|strong="H6127"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H7200"\w* \w ye|strong="H3117"\w* \w among|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w wonder|strong="H8539"\w* marvelously; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w working|strong="H6466"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w work|strong="H6467"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w which|strong="H1471"\w* \w ye|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* believe \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w told|strong="H5608"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w*, \w lo|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w hasty|strong="H4116"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w march|strong="H1980"\w* \w through|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w breadth|strong="H4800"\w* \w of|strong="H4908"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* earth, \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* \w dwelling|strong="H4908"\w* \w places|strong="H4908"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1471"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* theirs.

\w They|strong="H1931"\w* \w are|strong="H4941"\w* \w terrible|strong="H3372"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w dreadful|strong="H3372"\w*; \w their|strong="H3318"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w their|strong="H3318"\w* \w dignity|strong="H7613"\w* \w proceed|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* themselves.

\w Their|strong="H7043"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* also \w are|strong="H5483"\w* \w swifter|strong="H7043"\w* \w than|strong="H7043"\w* \w leopards|strong="H5246"\w*, \w and|strong="H5483"\w* \w are|strong="H5483"\w* more \w fierce|strong="H2300"\w* \w than|strong="H7043"\w* \w the|strong="H7043"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w wolves|strong="H2061"\w*; \w and|strong="H5483"\w* \w their|strong="H7043"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w* press proudly \w on|strong="H5483"\w*: yea, \w their|strong="H7043"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w* \w come|strong="H7350"\w* \w from|strong="H7350"\w* \w far|strong="H7350"\w*; they \w fly|strong="H5774"\w* \w as|strong="H6153"\w* an \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w* \w that|strong="H6153"\w* \w hasteth|strong="H2363"\w* \w to|strong="H2363"\w* devour.

\w They|strong="H3605"\w* come \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w violence|strong="H2555"\w*; \w the|strong="H3605"\w* set \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w forward|strong="H6440"\w*; \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* gather \w captives|strong="H7628"\w* \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sand|strong="H2344"\w*.

Yea, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* scoffeth \w at|strong="H4428"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w princes|strong="H7336"\w* \w are|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w derision|strong="H7832"\w* \w unto|strong="H4428"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w*; \w he|strong="H1931"\w* derideth \w every|strong="H3605"\w* stronghold; \w for|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* heapeth \w up|strong="H6651"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w taketh|strong="H3920"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5674"\w* \w shall|strong="H7307"\w* \w he|strong="H7307"\w* \w sweep|strong="H2498"\w* \w by|strong="H5674"\w* \add as\add* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, \w and|strong="H5674"\w* \w shall|strong="H7307"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w*, \w and|strong="H5674"\w* \w be|strong="H7307"\w* guilty, \add even\add* \w he|strong="H7307"\w* \w whose|strong="H2098"\w* \w might|strong="H3581"\w* \w is|strong="H7307"\w* \w his|strong="H5674"\w* god.

\w Art|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w thou|strong="H7760"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H6924"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w*? \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*. \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w thou|strong="H7760"\w* hast \w ordained|strong="H7760"\w* \w him|strong="H7760"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w thou|strong="H7760"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Rock|strong="H6697"\w*, hast \w established|strong="H3245"\w* \w him|strong="H7760"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w correction|strong="H3198"\w*.

\w Thou|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* art \w of|strong="H5869"\w* purer \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w canst|strong="H3201"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w* \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w perverseness|strong="H5999"\w*, \w wherefore|strong="H4100"\w* \w lookest|strong="H5027"\w* \w thou|strong="H7200"\w* \w upon|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* deal treacherously, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* holdest \w thy|strong="H7200"\w* \w peace|strong="H2790"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* swalloweth \w up|strong="H1104"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H7563"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w*;

\w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w makest|strong="H6213"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w fish|strong="H1709"\w* \w of|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w creeping|strong="H7431"\w* \w things|strong="H7431"\w*, \w that|strong="H7431"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w ruler|strong="H4910"\w* \w over|strong="H4910"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*?

\w He|strong="H3651"\w* taketh \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w angle|strong="H2443"\w*, \w he|strong="H3651"\w* catcheth \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w net|strong="H2764"\w*, \w and|strong="H5927"\w* gathereth \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w drag|strong="H1641"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w rejoiceth|strong="H8055"\w* \w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w sacrificeth|strong="H2076"\w* \w unto|strong="H6999"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w net|strong="H2764"\w*, \w and|strong="H2076"\w* burneth \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* \w unto|strong="H6999"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w drag|strong="H4365"\w*; \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w fat|strong="H1277"\w*, \w and|strong="H2076"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w food|strong="H3978"\w* \w plenteous|strong="H8082"\w*.

\w Shall|strong="H1471"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w empty|strong="H7324"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w net|strong="H2764"\w*, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w spare|strong="H2550"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*?
